kit.leader_skill: "Earth-Bred Fighters" or "Saiyan Saga" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional Ki +1 and HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the "Earthlings" or "Turtle School" Category

super_attack.name: Wolf Fang Kamehameha (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Explosive Ki Manipulation
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up for 1 turn; (Once) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200% up for 5 turns; (Once) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Once) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: DEF 40% up and chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up before attacking; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 40% up (up to 200%); (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up (up to 50%); After evading an attack: Launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack, within the turn; As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; For every Super Attack performed: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up within the turn

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up for 1 turn
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: DEF 40% up and chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up before attacking
lines.context: For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained

lines.text: ATK & DEF 40% up (up to 200%)
lines.context: For every attack performed

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up (up to 50%)
lines.context: For every attack performed

lines.text: Launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack, within the turn
lines.context: After evading an attack

lines.text: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
lines.context: As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up within the turn
lines.context: For every Super Attack performed

active_skill.name: Extra Large Spirit Ball
active_skill.effect: Causes ultimate damage to enemy; Within the turn activated,; attacks guaranteed to hit
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated after the character evades 4 or more enemy attacks (including s) in battle Or when all allies attacking in the same turn are "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category characters (once only)

passive_skill.name: Explosive Ki Manipulation
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when another 5 or more "Earth-Bred Fighters" Category allies are on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 150% up for 4 turns; (Once) Ki +2; (Once) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Once) Medium chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) High chance of evading enemy's attack; (Once) Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 30% up (up to 150%); After evading an attack: Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack within the turn; For every Super Attack performed: Chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up within the turn
